1.speaker: A
sentence: Wake up, sleepyhead! You sleep in every day.

2.speaker: B
sentence: I tossed and turned all night. I couldn't sleep a wink.
난 뒤척였어 밤새. 난 한숨도 못잤어.

3.speaker: A
sentence: I'm wondering if you make it on time for school.
나는 할 수 있을지 모르겠다 너가 할 수 있는지 제 시간에 맞춰갈지 학교에.

4.speaker: B
sentence: I'm in the middle of washing my hear already.
나는 하는 중이다 씻다 내 머리를 이미.

5.speaker: A
sentence: You're the black sheep of our family.

6.speaker: B
sentence: Come on. I just forgot to set the alarm.
왜 그래요. 나 단지 깜빡했어 알람을 맞추는 걸.
